description: Creates a Windows Defender Firewall rule to block a specific IPv4 address (Inbound or Outbound). Validates IPv4 format, is idempotent (reports if rule already exists), and emits a single NDJSON line with the outcome. Requires administrative privileges.

script_parameters.name: Direction
script_parameters.description: Firewall rule direction: Inbound or Outbound. Default: Inbound.
